member.name: T:TargitChartApi.Attribute.CustomIntRangeAttribute
member.summary: Specify minimum, maximum and optional step size for custom integer properties

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.Attribute.CustomIntRangeAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specify minimum, maximum and optional step size for custom integer properties

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.Attribute.PluginDescriptionAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Use this attribute to supply the plugin with a name and short description to present in the chart picklist.
Repeat with language codes to support multiple languages.
[PluginDescription("Line chart", "The line chart shows a progression of values, connected by lines to highlight the differences.")]
[PluginDescription("Bullet graph", "A linear and no-frills design provides a rich display of data in a small space.")]

member.param: Short label used in the chart picklist, e.g. "Line chart" or "Bullet graph"
Short description to present in the chart picklist, e.g. "The line chart shows a progression of values, connected by lines to highlight the differences."

param.name: languageCode
param.para: Support multiple languages by adding translated labels and descriptions with a language code.

member.name: T:TargitChartApi.Attribute.PluginIconAttribute
member.summary: Use this attribute to provide an icon resource to your chart

member.name: F:TargitChartApi.Attribute.PluginIconAttribute.ResourceName
member.summary: The resource name of the icon.

member.name: F:TargitChartApi.Attribute.PluginIconAttribute.Size
member.summary: The size (in pixels) of the icon. Only square icons are supported.

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.Attribute.PluginIconAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds an icon to your plugin
member.param: The resource name of the icon. Remember to set your icon file's build action to "Embedded Resource". The resource name is typically in this format: DefaultNameSpace.Resources.Icon.png
The size (in pixels) of the icon. Icons must be square, therefore width and height is the same

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.Attribute.PluginIconAttribute.GetIcon(System.Type)
member.summary: Call this to get the icon from the chart as a Bitmap
member.param: The Type of the chart you want the icon from

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.Attribute.PluginIconAttribute.GetIconStream(System.Type)
member.summary: Call this to get the icon from the chart as a Stream
member.param: The Type of the chart you want the icon from

member.name: T:TargitChartApi.Definition.ChartConfigMapLocationImage
member.summary: Add as custom property to get map location image, and to use the IMember.Location property for member locations: new CustomPropertyConfig<ChartConfigMapLocationImage> { Name="Map", PropertyPath="IChartMultiSeries" }

member.name: T:TargitChartApi.Definition.ChartConfigMapImage
member.summary: Add as custom property to get map image: new CustomPropertyConfig<ChartConfigMapImage> { Name="Map", PropertyPath="IChartMultiSeries" }

member.name: T:TargitChartApi.Definition.ChartConfigMapGeoSection
member.summary: Add as custom property to get map image with geograhical coordinates of the area it represents: new CustomPropertyConfig<ChartConfigMapGeoSection> { Name="Map", PropertyPath="IChartMultiSeries" }

summary.para: Supported property types: See IntelliSense for the CustomPropertyType enumeration

member.summary: Default value; the format depends on the property

member.name: P:TargitChartApi.Definition.DefaultValue.PersistenceSiblingCharts
member.summary: Useful for making the user's choice persistent across sibling charts, while still providing a default value. When changing from one chart type to another, if the other chart id is in this list, the value will not be reapplied.

member.summary: Is this item enabled or grayed out, depending on the users' current selection of other properties

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.ITemplate.GetTemplateConfig
member.summary: Configures custom properties, default values etc. for the chart.

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.ITemplate.GetDialogContents
member.summary: The chart property dialog is configured by filling out the DialogContents class, which describes tabs, tab contents, alternate leading texts and which propeties are required or ignored by the chart.
member.returns: The definition of the desired dialog contents

member.name: P:TargitChartApi.ITemplate.RenderWithoutAnimations
member.summary: True indicates that the rendered chart should not contain animations, as it will be shown as a flat bitmap rendering.

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.ITemplate.GetRenderedControl
member.summary: After all other API calls are applied, TARGIT requests the rendered chart by calling this function.

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.ITemplate.GetClickableAt(System.Windows.Point,System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: When clicking a flat bitmap rendering of a chart, which has no click events, we need another way of finding the corresponding crosstab position of the point clicked. The API supplies the crosstab positions, but it can not know the visual layout of a chart that implements it. This function connects the crosstab positions to their rendered ui element counterparts.
member.param: The size of the flat bitmap rendering of the chart
member.returns: The clickable item corresponding to its ui element counterpart.

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.ITemplate.GetHintAt(System.Windows.Point,System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Same as GetCrosstabPositionAt(Point clickPosition, Size contentSize), but should return the hint at that position instead.
member.param: The size of the flat bitmap rendering of the chart
member.returns: The hint corresponding to its ui element counterpart.

member.name: M:TargitChartApi.ITemplate.IsValidDefineMode(TargitChartApi.Definition.IDefineModeInfo,System.String@)
member.summary: Determine if sufficient measures and dimensions have been added in define mode
member.param: User-friendly message telling the user what is missing

member.summary: Custom image-dependent member configuration, e.g. image area id for this member

summary.para: MemberLocationMode.Geographical: Longitude in degrees (from west -180.0 to east 180.0), NaN if not configured
MemberLocationMode.ImagePlot: Horizontal position (from left 0.0 to right 1.0), NaN if not configured
MemberLocationMode.Geographical: Latitude in degrees (from south -90.0 to north 90.0), NaN if not configured
MemberLocationMode.ImagePlot: Vertical position (from bottom 0.0 to top 1.0), NaN if not configured
